text: Giuseppe Matarrese (3 June 1934 - 27 June 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1959. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Suburbicarian Diocese of Frascati, Italy, from 1989 to 2009.Diocese of Frascati Matarrese died on 27 June 2020, aged 86.E' morto il Vescovo emerito Mons. Giuseppe Matarrese ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Giuseppe Matarrese
